div.p: Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in AI/ML, IoT, and innovative tech solutions.
Passionate about bridging the gap between technology and real-world applications. Co-founder of Tech Insider Plus with expertise in SEO, blogging, and cutting-edge engineering solutions.

img.alt: Khan Basharat - Electronics Engineer & AI/ML Expert

div.p: Passionate about creating meaningful impact through cutting-edge technology and innovative engineering solutions.

I am a passionate Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, IoT, and Embedded Systems. With hands-on experience in hardware design, software development, and data science, I strive to bridge the gap between technology and real-world applications.

I've worked on projects ranging from IoT-based automation and robotics to AI-powered healthcare solutions. As a co-founder of Tech Insider Plus, I actively explore emerging technologies and have built a tech blog reaching millions of users with 500K+ monthly impressions, growing the business valuation to $10K.

My technical expertise spans Python, C, MATLAB, Embedded C, Flask, VHDL, SQL, and web development. Currently, I'm focused on developing innovative solutions that enhance efficiency and accessibility while contributing to the advancement of technology in various industries.
My career path through various roles, internships, and entrepreneurial ventures in technology and engineering.

Gained hands-on experience in industrial automation and pharmaceutical manufacturing processes. Worked extensively on PLC programming, system optimization, and process automation to enhance manufacturing efficiency and quality control.

Built and scaled a technology blog from ground up, reaching millions of users with 500K+ monthly impressions. Developed comprehensive content strategies, implemented advanced SEO techniques, and grew business valuation to $10K through innovative digital marketing approaches.

Developed advanced predictive models using Python and R for complex data analysis projects. Created comprehensive data visualizations, generated insightful technical reports, and contributed to research initiatives in machine learning and data science applications.

Gained comprehensive exposure to cutting-edge AI and machine learning technologies. Worked on diverse AI projects, implemented various ML algorithms, and contributed to the development of intelligent systems and applications.
My educational background and qualifications in engineering and technology.

div.div: Model Institute of Engineering and Technology
div.p: Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering - Comprehensive study of electronic systems, communication technologies, signal processing, and embedded systems design.

div.div: Govt Higher Sec. School Chandilora, Tangmarg
div.p: Completed higher secondary education with focus on science and mathematics, building a strong foundation for engineering studies.
Innovative solutions that bridge technology and real-world applications, showcasing my expertise in AI/ML, IoT, and software development.

Developed an intelligent healthcare monitoring system using advanced machine learning algorithms for early disease detection, patient monitoring, and predictive health analytics. The system improves diagnostic accuracy and reduces healthcare costs.

Created a comprehensive IoT automation system for smart home and industrial applications with real-time monitoring, control capabilities, and energy optimization features. Integrated with mobile apps and web dashboards.

Built and scaled a technology blog from scratch, achieving 500K+ monthly impressions and establishing a strong online presence in the tech community. Implemented advanced SEO strategies and content optimization techniques.
Comprehensive skill set spanning multiple domains of technology, engineering, and digital innovation.
Professional certifications and achievements that validate my expertise in various technology domains.
